name: Query a field that has no indexed inference results

caused_by.reason: A compatible version is required on both Content-Type and Accept headers if either one has requested a compatible version. Accept=null, Content-Type=application/vnd.elasticsearch+json; compatible-with=8

error.reason: Invalid media-type value on headers [Content-Type, Accept]

root_cause.reason: Invalid media-type value on headers [Content-Type, Accept]
